languages.text: "Пускай мы не во всем с вами сходимся, и я не всегда понимаю ваши мотивы, однако... Могу я быть с вами откровенна?"

traits.locale_text: "Пускай мы не во всем с вами сходимся, и я не всегда понимаю ваши мотивы, однако... Могу я быть с вами откровенна?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
languages.original_text: "Пускай мы не во всем с вами сходимся, и я не всегда понимаю ваши мотивы, однако... Могу я быть с вами откровенна?"

traits.locale_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “或许我们的想法并不一样，我也未必能理解你的动机，但即便如此……我可以对你坦诚相待吗？”
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: “或许我们的想法并不一样，我也未必能理解你的动机，但即便如此……我可以对你坦诚相待吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No pensamos del mismo modo y no siempre entiendo sus motivos, pero... ¿me permite que sea sincera?».
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: «No pensamos del mismo modo y no siempre entiendo sus motivos, pero... ¿me permite que sea sincera?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしたちは同じように考えることはできないかもしれませんし、{name}様の動機がいつも理解できるわけでもないでしょう。それでも率直にお話させてもらってもよろしいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしたちは同じように考えることはできないかもしれませんし、{name}様の動機がいつも理解できるわけでもないでしょう。それでも率直にお話させてもらってもよろしいでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir denken vielleicht nicht gleich, und Eure Motive erschließen sich mir nicht immer, aber ... darf ich offen mit Euch sein?"
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir denken vielleicht nicht gleich, und Eure Motive erschließen sich mir nicht immer, aber ... darf ich offen mit Euch sein?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous n'avons peut-être pas la même vision des choses, vous et moi, et j'ai parfois peine à comprendre vos motivations, mais... me permettrez-vous de me montrer parfaitement honnête à votre égard ? »
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avons peut-être pas la même vision des choses, vous et moi, et j'ai parfois peine à comprendre vos motivations, mais... me permettrez-vous de me montrer parfaitement honnête à votre égard ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Aynı düşünmüyor olabiliriz, eylemlerinin arkasındaki sebepleri de her zaman anlayamıyor olabilirim ama seninle içten konuşabilir miyim?"
languages.original_text: "We may not think alike, and I do not always understand your motives, and yet... May I be candid with you?"

traits.locale_text: "Aynı düşünmüyor olabiliriz, eylemlerinin arkasındaki sebepleri de her zaman anlayamıyor olabilirim ama seninle içten konuşabilir miyim?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
